fields.name: iphone-reg
fields.text:
Greetings!

Follow these four simple steps to set up Firefox Home and start sharing your Firefox history, bookmarks and even your open tabs between your computer and your iPhone or iPod Touch:

1. Install the free Firefox Sync add-on on your desktop: <http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/sync/>
   (Firefox Home uses the sync capabilities from the Firefox Sync add-on to access your Firefox browser information and securely send it to your iPhone.)

2. Restart Firefox and follow prompts to create an account with both a password and a Secret Phrase.

3. Sign in, then go to your iPhone to complete the setup.

4. On your iPhone, enter your new account log-in info in the fields provided and tap "Done" on the keypad.
   (Already using Firefox Sync on your desktop? Go to iTunes and install the Firefox Home app from the App Store on your iPhone.)

You're done! After these steps, you can take your favorite parts of the Web with you on your iPhone.

If you do not setup Firefox Home within one week of receiving this email, one reminder email will be sent to you.

See our Privacy Policy: <http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/privacy-policy.html>
Visit us for more information about Firefox Home: <http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/mobile/home/>
